<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.assessment_core" name="Assessment" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="Assessments" type="application" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true" namespace="sn_assessment_core" license_model="producer">
<extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="AssessmentEngineAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentEngineAjax" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.assessment_core_take" class="com.snc.assessment_core.TakeAssessment" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="com.snc.asmt_attachment_list" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentAttachmentTag" /> <description> Plug-in for Assessments, Surveys and Ratings </description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.workflow"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.survey"/> <import plugin="com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey"/> <import plugin="com.glide.survey_designer"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="ScorecardAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.ScorecardAjax" /> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="ComparisonAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.ComparisonAjax" /> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="DecisionMatrixAjax" class="com.snc.assessment_core.DecisionMatrixAjax" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AssessmentCreation" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentCreation" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScopedAssessmentCreation" class="com.snc.assessment_core.ScopedAssessmentCreation"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SetAssessmentResults" class="com.snc.assessment_core.SetAssessmentResults" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Rating" class="com.snc.assessment_core.Rating" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AssessmentUpgradeHelper" class="com.snc.assessment_core.AssessmentUpgradeHelper" /> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Plug-in for Assessments, Surveys and Ratings</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Assessments</help> <id>com.snc.assessment_core</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Assessment</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.assessment_core/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.workflow,com.glideapp.survey,com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey,com.glide.survey_designer</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.assessment_core</sys_id>
